comment_text: By "guaranteeing stability" you mean disband the dictatorships and armer groups they established in order to stop the CPPP expansion? Now, these same leaders that militarized the world in order to stop the Soviet Union are deciding our domestic laws in order to stop another country from threatening their economic and military supremacy.
author: Maken
story_title: Whoever Is Leaking Trans-Pacific Partnership Drafts: Please Leak More
